Checks the validity of a borrower's collateral balance.

liquidateCollateral(uint256,address).notice: Sends the deposited collateral to a liquidator of a bid.Can only be called by the protocol.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws deposited collateral from the created escrow of a bid.
